â€¢ If all prerequisites are fulfilled, and the pre-induction CTG is normal, induction of labour can be performed
using one of the available methods.
GENERAL MEASURES 
Counsel the woman about the risks: failed induction or uterine hyperstimulation, which may require emergency 
Caesarean delivery.
